empty.title: No notifications yet
empty.description: When people comment or reply to your resumes, they will appear here.

llm.title: OpenAI/Ollama Integration
llm.description1: You can make use of the OpenAI API to help you generate content, or improve your writing while composing your resume.
llm.description2: You have the option to <1>obtain your own OpenAI API key</1>. This key empowers you to leverage the API as you see fit. Alternatively, if you wish to disable the AI features in Reactive Resume altogether, you can simply remove the key from your settings.
llm.description3: You can also integrate with Ollama simply by setting the API key to `sk-1234567890abcdef` and the Base URL to your Ollama URL, i.e. `http://localhost:11434/v1`. You can also pick and choose models and set the max tokens as per your preference.

cloudSync.title: Cloud Sync
cloudSync.description: Sync your resume data across devices. Your data will be stored securely in the cloud.

disclaimer.title: Cloud Sync Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Please read and agree to the following terms before enabling cloud sync:
disclaimer.content: By enabling cloud sync, your resume data (including personal info, experience, etc.) will be uploaded to our secure servers. This allows you to access your resumes from any device. We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data. However, please be aware that this means your data is no longer stored solely on your local device.

hero.title: Magic Resume is an AI-powered tool for building resumes
hero.subtitle: Craft your perfect resume with the power of AI. Simple, smart, and secure.
texts: Beautiful, professional templates ready to use
100% free and privacy-focused, data stays local
Export to PDF with one click, ATS-friendly
hero.macbookTitle:
This Macbook is built with Tailwindcss.
No kidding.

main.title: Why Choose Magic Resume?
main.subtitle: We provide an all-in-one resume solution to make your job search journey smoother

ai.title: Smart Detection, Professional Advice
ai.description: Built-in smart grammar check, automatically identifies inappropriate expressions, provides professional modification suggestions, making your resume more outstanding.

export.description: Supports exporting in multiple formats for easy sharing and backup.

privacy.description: All resume data is fully stored locally, no need to worry about privacy leaks. Support data export backup, ensure your resume data is always available.

preview.title: Live Preview
preview.description: See your changes in real-time as you type. No more guessing how your final resume will look.

dnd.title: Drag & Drop Interface
dnd.description: Effortlessly reorder sections to highlight your strengths with an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

contact.title: Connect with Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

content.label: Message
content.placeholder: Tell us what you'd like to say...

footer.brandSubtitle: The next-gen AI resume platform that makes hiring simple.

createTab.initialMessage: Hello! I'm ResuMate, your personal resume crafting assistant. To start, what kind of job or industry are you targeting?

createTab.retryFailed: Request failed after multiple retries. Please try again later.
